name: Yume no Kage
description:
This game was made as a submission for AnimeJam in Trnava,Slovakia.

Welcome to the world of Yume no Kage!

You play as a teenager Kaito, who is an ordinary high school student, but you have fallen asleep... Try to save Kaito from this mysterious nightmare by dodging and killing waves of monsters until he wakes up..

While making this game, our goal for this jam was to learn more about game making while working together as a team. As we are Vampire Survivor´s fans ourselves, we decided to make our own clone with our own assets and a story, within godot 4 engine and aseprite sprite editor.

Our team:
Michal Zamiška - programmer  https://netnekos.itch.io
Richard Majdán - 2D artist https://smlmdmlm.itch.io/
Dominika Poláková - 2D artist https://akimimishimira.itch.io
Marián Stupák - level designer https://majkniki.itch.io/
Timotej Kuna - audio maker https://timotejkuna.itch.io

Music in our game: Dark Flowers by Electronic Senses
